text: Khumbulani okokuba uIbrâhîm wathi: “Nkosi yethu yenza esi sixeko ibe sisixeko sokhuseleko. Unike abantu baso iziqhamo (ingakumbi) abakholwayo kuAllâh nakwiMini yokuGqibela.” UAllâh Waphendula: “Lowo ungakholwayo Ndiya kumyeka ahlale enelisekile okwethutyana, Ndize Ndimnyanzelise ukuba angene eMlilweni wokumngcungcuthekisa. Hayi ububi besiphelo solo hambo.”
